rifleman.name: Rifleman
rifleman.description: Rifleman ready! Let's take the fight to the enemy!

heavy.name: Heavy
heavy.description: Hey, great! The HQ is finally big enough for us Heavies. We're tough enough to walk straight into the line of fire. Let's go get them!

zooka.name: Zooka
zooka.description: Need something blown to bits? A few shots from my bazooka will destroy any enemy building!

warrior.name: Warrior
warrior.description: We're a warrior tribe of many strong men! Let us join your fight against the invaders.

tank.name: Tank
tank.description: Tank ready for battle! This baby has a long range cannon and thick armor to boot.

grenadier.name: Grenadier
grenadier.description: I hear you chaps have been looking for an explosives expert. Well, you struck lucky! I'll toss a few mashers their way, and Bob's your uncle - those Blaggards go up in smoke!

cryoneer.name: Cryoneer
cryoneer.description: Nice to meet you, Commander! Cryoneer reporting in. My Freeze Beam can seriously reduce the firepower of enemy defenses. It's also great for cooling beverages and making ice sculptures!
